text: Also Jesus, Annus, Sarabias, Iadinus, Jacubus, Sabateus, Hodiah. Auteas, Maiannas, and Calitas, Azarias, and Jozabdus, and Ananias, Phalias, the Levites, taught the law of the Lord, Some authorities omit and read...Lord. and read to the multitude the law of the Lord, making them withal to understand it.
